name: Ultimate Hero
description:
Prepare for tag action! Real heroes and villains from history have been summoned to stand against the greatest evil that threatens the very existence of humankind!
Collect cards, build your deck, and upgrade over real heroes & villains of all time, from all over the world: King Arthur, Robin Hood, Genghis Khan, Cleopatra, Knight Lancelot, Jeanne d’Arc, and many, many more!
Lead your team of heroes to victory!
- Play the epic Action RPG with generations of Heroes and Villains from all over the world!
- Clear 300+ single play dungeons and epic bosses with your team of heroes
- Unlock new play modes as you level up
- Explore each of the heroes and their unique tag skills
- Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect and add powerful new heroes to your deck, and upgrade your favorite ones
- Build, upgrade & customize your deck according to heroes’ attributes and tag skills
- Construct your ultimate battle deck to dominate stages and other players
- Duel players from around the world in real-time tag 3v3 PVP action
- Form a Guild to team up and conquer raid bosses, team missions to earn special bonus buffs for your own battle community
- Compete against your friends in time attack challenge & infinite wave defense!
- Monthly updates for new characters, new chapters & even more action!
